snippet: Coach André Villas-Boas was fired by Tottenham after 17 months in charge of the team, which failed to jell after several expensive summer signings.
abstract: Tottenham fires coach Andre Villas-Boas after 17 months in charge of the team, which failed to jell after several expensive summer signings; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Coach André Villas-Boas was fired by Tottenham after 17 months in charge of the team, which failed to jell after several expensive summer signings.
